subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस उच्चों का जंगल है?
explanation_en:
Jodhpur, also known as Marwar, is famous for its magnificent forts. Kailash Fort is a historic fort located in Jodhpur.

जोधपुर, मरवार के समाधान के बार्मांड
explanation_hi: जोधपुर, मरवार से जाने के समाधान के बार्मांड
explanation_en: Rajasthan is a state in India known for its rich history and culture.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान एनिया में राजनी के प्रमाण के समाधान के बार्मांड

explanation_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_hi.question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jodhpur?
explanation_hi.question_hi: जोधपुर में किस निष्टिकल के समाधान
explanation_hi.explanation_en:
Mehrangarh Fort is a well-known historical fort located in Jodhpur.

Kumbhalgarh Fort is situated in Chittorgarh district and is known for its strong construction.

Umaid Bhawan Palace is a palace built by Maharaja Umaid Singh in Jodhpur.

Lalgarh Fort is a fort located in Jaisalmer district.

Mandore Temple is a temple complex in Jodhpur.

explanation_hi: मेहनगर में जो संती किस्तोगारम में जो संती के जोगारम में जो संती के जोगारम में जोगारम
explanation_en:
Mehrangarh Fort is a historic fort located in Jaisalmer district and is famous for its intricate carvings.

Kumbhalgarh Fort is in Jodhpur and is known for its unique architecture.

Umaid Bhawan Palace is a palace built by Maharaja Umaid Singh of Jaisalmer.

Jaisalmer Fort is a significant historical monument in Jaisalmer district.

explanation_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_hi.question_en: Which forts are considered famous in Rajasthan?
explanation_hi.explanation_en:
These forts have attracted tourists due to their architectural beauty.

Jaisalmer Fort is known for its unique design.

Umaid Bhawan Palace is a majestic palace built by Maharaja Umaid Singh of Jaisalmer district.
explanation_hi.question_en: Which forts are located in Jaisalmer district?

options.explanation_en:
Mehrangarh Fort is a historical fort built by Rao Jaisal Singh, who ruled Jaisalmer district.

Kumbhalgarh Fort is a magnificent fort built by Maharaja Rao Jaisal Singh, who is known for its architecture and strategic importance.
